Chinese: 怎麼樣，有得到什麼情報嗎？
German: Wie läuft es? Schon etwas gefunden?

English: Great. Tell me when you get back.
Chinese: 這樣啊，詳細狀況等回去再告訴我吧。
German: Gut. Sag mir, wenn du wieder da bist.

English:
Sorry for making you go. Didn't any of the
students recognize you?
Chinese:
……還有，把打聽消息交給你，抱歉了啊。
你沒有被學生們發現吧？
Korean:
……그리고, 탐문을 맡겨버려서 미안하군.
너에 대한 걸 학생들이 알아차리진 않았나?
German:
Entschuldige, dass ich dich geschickt habe. Haben
dich Schüler erkannt?

English:
It's fine!
It was okay, but I was really nervous...
Chinese:
一點問題都沒有！
沒關係啦，只是有點緊張……
German:
Schon in Ordnung!
Ging schon, aber ich war echt nervös ...

English:
Sorry to hear that. But I think asking you to
handle my part of the investigation would have
been asking too much.
Chinese:
抱歉，但要是把我這的調查交給你做，
我覺得對你太過沉重了。
Korean:
미안하군. 하지만 내가 맡은 조사 쪽은
네겐 버겁다고 생각했거든
German:
Tut mir leid. Aber ich denke, mit meinem Teil der
Ermittlung wärst du überfordert gewesen.

English:
While you were asking around, I found out some
things about the hacking tool.
Chinese:
在你打聽消息的時候，
我調查駭客工具也有進展。
Korean:
네가 탐문하고 있는 동안
이쪽에서 진행하고 있던 해킹툴 조사도 진전이 있었다
German:
Während du dich umgehört hast, habe ich etwas über
das Hackertool herausgefunden.

English:
Let's meet at Hudie to share what we've found and
discuss how to proceed.
Chinese:
到hudie碰頭吧。
來交換情報跟討論接下來的調查。
Korean:
후디에에서 합류한다.
정보 공유와 앞으로의 조사에 대해 상의하자
German:
Treffen wir uns bei Hudie und besprechen unsere
Befunde und den weiteren Plan.
